com.aurel.track.admin.customize.workflow.activity

Interface IActivityConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActivity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldChangeConfig, AccessLevelFieldChangeConfig, ArchiveLevelFieldChangeConfig, BooleanFieldChangeConfig, CommentChangeConfig, CompositeSelectFieldChangeConfig, DateFieldChangeConfig, DoubleFieldChangeConfig, IntegerFieldChangeConfig, ItemPickerFieldChangeConfig, MultipleListFieldChangeConfig, MultipleTreeFieldChangeConfig, ParentFieldChangeConfig, RichTextFieldChangeConfig, SingleListFieldChangeConfig, SystemSingleTreeFieldChangeConfig, TextAreaFieldChangeConfig, TextFieldChangeConfig

    public interface IActivityConfig
extends IActivity
    Base interface for configuring a field change

      • getValueRendererJsonConfig

        java.lang.String getValueRendererJsonConfig(java.lang.Object configuredValue,
                                          java.lang.Object assignedValue,
                                          java.lang.Object dataSource,
                                          boolean withParameter,
                                          TPersonBean personBean,
                                          java.util.Locale locale)
        The JSON configuration object for configuring the js control(s) containing the value Called by adding/editing an activity by configuring the workflow or setting the parameters by assigning a paremeterized workflow into a context
        Parameters:
        configuredValue: - the value set by configuring the workflow (add/edit activity)
        assignedValue: - if value contains parameter the assigned value in context
        dataSource: - defined only for lists (list for global lists, map for context dependent lists)
        withParameter - whether to include $PARAMETER in datasource
        personBean -
        locale -
        Returns:
